content: {"name": "MCNY Bronx Campus Community Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Basically this is only for school student and there family but if there is needy in neighborhood we will not return", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mcny.edu/mcny-bronx/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "463 E 149th St", "address_2": null, "city": "New York", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10455", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8151917, "longitude": -73.9152}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 665-7787", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No food distribution - marked unavailable"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
